item.title: A Washington State Senator Is Looking to Unseat One of the Quirkiest, Most Vulnerable House Dems in ’26
item.description: But knocking out the moderate-leaning rep won’t be easy.

item.title: How the Internet Broke Assimilation
item.description: Social media and messaging apps have eased the pressure to integrate.

item.title: The Legacy Media’s Not Dead Yet
item.description: These outlets don’t have the credibility they once did, but they still have power. Just look at the Minnesota fraud scandal.

item.title: We All Need Almsgiving
item.description: Acts of generosity are little rebellions against isolation.

item.title: The U.S.-Israel Alliance Pays for Itself
item.description: From real-time intelligence to combat-tested systems, Israel provides strategic benefits that exceed the cost of U.S. aid many times over.
